reviewText: While Haboush obviously set out to make one of the worse movies ever, I honestly love this silly crazy story of bullying and revenge with a legendary climax featuring vengeful rape murders and pizza toppings.  This video will be enjoyed by anyone who can appreciate immature comedy treatment of adult sexual themes.  Some great West Hollywood stars appear in this no-budget movie with full on Gaysploitation, plenty of male nudity, sex and violence.
I got rid of this dvd. It was horrible and I disposed of it immediately.

Honestly-- another piece to add to the trash pile. This is pornography to every level. What a waste of time. Usually you can at least make a few jokes and get a few laughs out of a bad film... it was impossible to even find enjoyment in that attempt. This movie is so horrid, that you will find yourself picking your jaw up off the ground repeatedly. It's a BAD THING!!!! Ughhhh

What a piece of crap! This is a wanna be porno, but doesn't even make the cut there. Nothing but a serious waste of time here. Easily one of the worst movies I have ever seen. One star is too generous.
This will be shot and to the point.  This was a great movie and I loved every minute of it. Good Buy
